description:
Quick Access Popup is a multi-purpose launcher and folder switcher! It creates a customizable popup with favorites folders/documents paths and various actions to speed up your work. Freeware for Windows. Quick Access Popup was designed for all international versions of Windows 7, Windows 8/8.1 and Windows 10, both client and server versions, with Explorer windows, File Dialog Boxes (Open, Save, etc.*), Console Window (CMD command prompt) and many popular alternative file managers.
	
![Quick Access Popup](https://cdn.statically.io/gh/nicolafarina/chocolatey-packages/401d100c/qap/screenshot_01.png)
	
[More screenshots](https://www.quickaccesspopup.com/slideshow-using-popup-menus/)

### Free software (again)
**WARNING: starting from version 11.5, Quick Access Popup is a full freeware/donorware software again. No license is required for any feature.**
summary: Quick Access Popup is a multi-purpose launcher and folder switcher!
author: Jean Lalonde
